title: Zerodha Clone – Full-Stack Stock Trading App
description: A full-stack stock trading platform clone built for a freelance client's semester project. Features include mock trading, watchlists,and portfolio tracking.

title: Connectify – Real-Time Video Conferencing App
description: A browser-based video conferencing app built with the MERN stack, WebRTC, and Socket.io. Users can join virtual rooms, connect via peer-to-peer video/audio, and chat in real-time—all without third-party services.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio showcasing my skills, projects, contact details, and live demos. Built to share who I am, the work I want to do, and provide direct links to GitHub and live projects.
